# learn_go_web_session
go web编程中session章节的代码

# 使用说明
```bash
$ curl -XPOST -d username=zhang  -c - http://192.168.1.241:8099/login
receive [zhang]# Netscape HTTP Cookie File
# http://curl.haxx.se/docs/http-cookies.html
# This file was generated by libcurl! Edit at your own risk.

#HttpOnly_192.168.1.241	FALSE	/	FALSE	1681292786	gosessionid	zCWU1E8HtUsi5bnJYHi4AfknWhDb-wCmkVg51dJMVeg%3D

```

```bash
$ curl -c - http://192.168.1.241:8099/count
cur num: 1
# Netscape HTTP Cookie File
# http://curl.haxx.se/docs/http-cookies.html
# This file was generated by libcurl! Edit at your own risk.

#HttpOnly_192.168.1.241	FALSE	/	FALSE	1681292880	gosessionid	bXZHSDTFzFkLUg6y40whHdW4FfxTO80Yzppv2flhZZc%3D

然后使用返回的cookie再次发送
$ curl -c -  --cookie "gosessionid=bXZHSDTFzFkLUg6y40whHdW4FfxTO80Yzppv2flhZZc%3D" http://192.168.1.241:8099/count
cur num: 2

$ curl -c -  --cookie "gosessionid=bXZHSDTFzFkLUg6y40whHdW4FfxTO80Yzppv2flhZZc%3D" http://192.168.1.241:8099/count
cur num: 3
```
